projects.title: Pets R Us
projects.description: This here was my final project for my 201 course that I took with Code Fellows. As of yet this is my most extensive project that I have the opportunity to not only work on, but collaberate with others.

projects.title: Gallery Of Horns
projects.description: This project was my most recent that I have taken the time to develop for code fellows. In this project I was responsible for dynamically rendering a select beast by filtering the number of horns they have.
